title: Seventh Son (uk) - Dangerous Kiss (1987) NWOBHM
description:
Music : Metal : MP3/192Kbps
This is the 1987 album Dangerous Kiss from the band Seventh Son.
Seventh Son are a vastly underrated five-piece NWOBHM band based in Barnsley, South Yorkshire, UK. Formed in 1979, they have been compared to the mighty Saxon, which is no bad thing, but their sound has evolved over the years to include many diverse influences, such as Metallica and post-grunge. credit to the original upper btw.

The current line-up comprises:
Bri Shaughnessy - vocals
Dave Fox - guitar
Bob Elliot - guitar
Rick Gregory - bass
Alan Bark - drums

They are signed to the Iron Pages label, who are releasing the bands' superb NEW album 'Spirit World'. Listen to samples/buy the album at http://www.seventh-son.co.uk/spiritworld.html or visit http:www.mysp---.com/seventhsonuk
and help support this great band!
